name: CLPlacemark
desc: A user-friendly description of a geographic coordinate, often containing the name of the place, its address, and other relevant information.

items.name: init(placemark: CLPlacemark)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a placemark object from another placemark object.

items.name: init(location: CLLocation, name: String?, postalAddress: CNPostalAddress?)
items.desc: Creates and initializes a placemark object using the specified location and address information.

items.name: var location: CLLocation?
items.desc: The location object containing latitude and longitude information.

items.name: var isoCountryCode: String?
items.desc: The abbreviated country or region name.

items.name: var country: String?
items.desc: The name of the country or region associated with the placemark.

items.name: var postalCode: String?
items.desc: The postal code associated with the placemark.

items.name: var administrativeArea: String?
items.desc: The state or province associated with the placemark.

items.name: var subAdministrativeArea: String?
items.desc: Additional administrative area information for the placemark.

items.name: var locality: String?
items.desc: The city associated with the placemark.

items.name: var subLocality: String?
items.desc: Additional city-level information for the placemark.

items.name: var thoroughfare: String?
items.desc: The street address associated with the placemark.

items.name: var subThoroughfare: String?
items.desc: Additional street-level information for the placemark.

items.name: var region: CLRegion?
items.desc: The geographic region associated with the placemark.

items.name: var timeZone: TimeZone?
items.desc: The time zone associated with the placemark.

items.name: var postalAddress: CNPostalAddress?
items.desc: The postal address associated with the location, formatted for use with the Contacts framework.

items.name: var inlandWater: String?
items.desc: The name of the inland water body associated with the placemark.

items.name: var ocean: String?
items.desc: The name of the ocean associated with the placemark.

items.name: var areasOfInterest: [String]?
items.desc: The relevant areas of interest associated with the placemark.
